name: Sticky Easel Pad,13 in x 17 in Flip Chart Paper, 35 Sheets/Pad, Sticky Anchor Chart Paper for Teachers,Self-Stick Easel Paper,Super Sticky & Bleed-Resistant for Classroom, Office, 3 Pads
short_description: Mini Chart Paper: You will receive 3 packs 13* 17in easel paper. Each pack contains 35 sheets of paper, totaling 105 sheets of paper. It is suitable for scenarios such as school classrooms, offices, and meetings. The right size can fit into your suitcase and be taken away at any time.

No Bleeding Through: The anchor chart paper has a certain thickness that can prevent ink from penetrating. When you doodle on the paper with a marker pen, it can prevent the ink from spreading and avoid blurring the handwriting. It can also effectively prevent the underlying paper from being contaminated and avoid wasting paper.

Super Strong Adhesion: The back of the chart paper for teachers has a very strong adhesion. You can tear off the paper and stick it on the surface of different objects such as wood boards, walls, blackboards, whiteboards, glass, etc. Moreover, when you want to reposition or discard the paper, tearing it off will not leave any residue.

Multiple hanging designs: The top of the flip chart paper is designed with three different hanging slot designs, which can be compatible with easels or whiteboards of different sizes. Moreover, the back of the product has a sturdy backplate, which is a significant advantage. When traveling, you can easily place it on your lap and use it, keeping your easel paper stable during use without the need for an easel.

Ideal manage project: This easel paper is made of 100 g/m2 thickened premium paper, so it is not easily damaged or curled during use. It is very suitable for brainstorming training, presentations, meetings, and doodling, enable team members to collaborate and communicate easily.

PERFECT FOR BRAINSTORMING - Unruled sheets encourage freeform drawing, diagramming, and brainstorming, allowing you to illustrate ideas clearly and adaptively during meetings or planning sessions.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL SHEETS - Repositionable sticky sheets easily adhere to most surfaces without leaving damage, facilitating flexible group discussions or visual aids without concern for residue.
HIGH-QUALITY PAPER - Each pad contains 30 sheets of premium paper, suitable for writing, drawing, or creating charts in professional sessions, ensuring durability during repeated use.

CONSCIOUS MATERIALS - Made with 30% recycled content, this large easel pad combines sustainability with functionality, supporting environmentally responsible office practices and creative collaboration.

short_description: 【Large Size Chart Paper】 Comix flip chart paper comes in a large size of 25 x 30 inches, 30 Sheets/Pad, 4 Pads/Pack, providing plenty of space for writing and drawing.
【Super Sticky】This easel paper features a strong adhesive that sticks securely to most surfaces, making it easy to use in a variety of settings.
【Ink Bleed-Through Resistance】The large sticky notes paper can resist bleed-through from markers or pens, ensuring that your notes and ideas stay clear and easy to read.

【Strong and Durable】Comix easel pad is made from 90 gsm thick, high-quality paper that are strong and durable, so it won't tear or rip easily. The cardboard is also strong enough for hanging and carrying.
【Versatile Use】Suitable for a wide range of applications, including office meetings, classroom lectures, training sessions, brainstorming, and more.

【Tips】Comix anchor chart paper is suitable for sticking on the indoor flat substrates ,such as latex walls, wooden door, glass, blackboards, whiteboards, metal, etc. lt is not recommended to stick on the conspicuously concave-convex substrates, specially diatomaceous mud wall or spray painted walls.
